name: Suidakra
description: '''Suidakra''' (stylized '''SuidAkrA''') is a German [[melodic death metal]] band from [[DÃ¼sseldorf]], Germany. During their thirty-year career, they have performed over 200 live shows for several European and Russian tours, as well as a North American tour. They are known for their use of traditional instruments to augment their sound, such as the [[bagpipe]], [[banjo]], and [[tin whistle]].
